[[Comment was deleted::{{{CommentWasDeleted|false}}}]] {{#if:{{{AttachedArticles|}}}|{{#arraymapce:{{{AttachedArticles|}}}|,|x|[[Has attached article::x]]}}|no attached articles}} [[Category:Comment]] {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} {{Content hash|value=}} defd61e9147dc7ccb44e3f39950241e8 Template:ShowComments 167 2011-07-04T13:56:02Z WikiSysop 1 {{Template}} [[Rationale::Shows all comments incl. a form entry field for the given article.]] [[Category:Template]] {{#ifeq:{{{show|}}}|True|{{ShowCommentsIntern}}|}} {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} {{Content hash|value=}} 38b0122f095b2e00c357ecf529a0f69f Collaboration 217 2011-08-24T15:32:02Z WikiSysop 1 {{Content bundle}} [[Rationale::This content bundle features a set of basic elements that are necessary for the Collaboration extension.| ]] {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} [[Maintainer::ontoprise GmbH| ]] [[Vendor::ontoprise GmbH| ]] [[Help Url::http://smwforum.ontoprise.com/smwforum/index.php/Help:Collaboration_Extension | ]] [[Ontology version::140| ]] [[Installation dir::extensions/Collaboration| ]] [[Dependency::Smwplus; 153; 153| ]][[Dependency::Widgets; 092; 092| ]][[Dependency::Richmedia; 152; 152| ]] [[License::GPL v2| ]] ;This content bundle comprises a set of articles that are necessary to make use of the Collaboration extension. ;How to use Simply add the template call {{ShowComments|show=True}} into the article(s) to enable your users to leave comments for. Usually you include this template call at the bottom of the page. ;Sandbox We have created a small [[Collaboration_Sandbox|Sandbox of the Collaboration extension]] in this Wiki to give you a smooth start. ;User manual More information about the Collaboration extension and how to use it can be found in our [http://smwforum.ontoprise.com/smwforum/index.php/Help:Collaboration_Extension Collaboration extension help article at SMWForum]. ;This bundle contains these articles : {{#ask:[[Part of bundle::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] |?=Link |?Rationale |link=subject |default=''none'' |mainlabel=- |source=wiki }} [[Category:Content bundle|Content_bundle]] {{Content hash|value=a5b59c7c93de4673e7a007ab705bdafa}} aa547de823b61607a3b49c4ccbe5ba42 Collaboration Sandbox 262 2011-08-24T16:05:21Z WikiSysop 1 = Collaboration Sandbox = Just click on '''"Show comments"''' below to read and add comments. Have a look at [[User:Collaboration|the article of our sandbox user]] to discover his latest comments powered by [[Template:Show comments infobox for user]]. Feel free to use this template on all your user pages by entering 
{{Show comments infobox for user
|show=True
}}
to these articles. We also created [[/Collaboration_best_articles|a sample article to display the best rated articles]] in this wiki that calls [[Template:Show best rated articles]]. You can use this template call in any other pages, too. 
{{Show best rated articles
|show=True
}}
Since version 1.4.0 the Collaboration extension recommends to install the [http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Widgets Widgets extensions]. If you accepted this, [[/Widget examples|these widget examples]] would make a quick impression about ''how to embed widgets'' to a page. More information can be found also in the [http://smwforum.ontoprise.com/smwforum/index.php?title=Help:Using_the_Collaboration_extension_1.4&context=Help%3ACollaboration+extension+1.4 Collaboration extension help article]. Get this extension on our [http://smwforum.ontoprise.com/smwforum/index.php/Download download page]! [[Rationale::A small Sandbox of the Collaboration extension in this Wiki to give you a smooth start.| ]] {{ShowComments |show=True }} {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} {{Content hash|value=}} 918118ae5c791df418d145a75158f20a Comment:Collaboration Sandbox 1295602691794 263 2011-04-14T12:45:02Z WikiSysop 1 {{Comment|CommentPerson=User:Collaboration|CommentRelatedArticle=Collaboration_Sandbox|CommentRating=1|CommentDatetime=2011-01-21T10:38:11+01:00|CommentContent=Do you want to let your visitors have a say and encourage discussions in your wiki? Then introduce meta talking with the Collaboration extension.|}} {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} {{Content hash|value=}} [[Rationale::A small sample comment for the Sandbox of the Collaboration extension in this Wiki.| ]] cb546e04b624a3cb2e1b07ed1067086e Comment:Collaboration Sandbox 1295602913516 264 2011-04-14T12:45:33Z WikiSysop 1 {{Comment|CommentPerson=User:Collaboration|CommentRelatedArticle=Collaboration_Sandbox|CommentRating=1|CommentDatetime=2011-01-21T10:41:52+01:00|CommentContent=Communicating about topics and media is a basic community feature. You can upgrade your wiki essentially if you allow your visitors to present and discuss their opinions about certain articles. Or you would like to set up a conversation focused wiki where commenting is the superordinate and actual objective and therefore always available. You can have it your way and expand the attraction of your wiki in any case. |}} {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} {{Content hash|value=}} [[Rationale::A small sample comment for the Sandbox of the Collaboration extension in this Wiki.| ]] 76c354a3478aa2d2bda1c500b02a69e6 Comment:Collaboration Sandbox 1295602948268 265 2011-04-14T12:06:43Z WikiSysop 1 {{Comment|CommentPerson=User:Collaboration|CommentRelatedArticle=Collaboration_Sandbox|CommentRelatedComment=Comment:Collaboration_Sandbox_1295602913516|CommentDatetime=2011-01-21T10:42:27+01:00|CommentContent=So let people take part and rate contents with the Collaboration extension.|}} {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} {{Content hash|value=}} [[Rationale::A small sample comment for the Sandbox of the Collaboration extension in this Wiki.| ]] 805daee6005bee77b252ca0ec0b3646f Comment:Collaboration Sandbox 1295603031029 266 2011-04-14T12:05:22Z WikiSysop 1 {{Comment|CommentPerson=User:Collaboration|CommentRelatedArticle=Collaboration_Sandbox|CommentDatetime=2011-01-21T10:43:50+01:00|CommentContent=The features of the Collaboration extension:
Let your visitors comment and rate articles and contents
Allow discussions about and replies to expressed opinions
Aggregate comments in different ways (e.g. lists of all exisiting comments, the 10 latest comments or all contributions of a certain user)|}} {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} {{Content hash|value=}} [[Rationale::A small sample comment for the Sandbox of the Collaboration extension in this Wiki.| ]] 363d82900dc5c2f336bb5b2ce8594251 Comment:Collaboration Sandbox 1295603163565 267 2011-04-14T12:05:14Z WikiSysop 1 {{Comment|CommentPerson=User:Collaboration|CommentRelatedArticle=Collaboration_Sandbox|CommentRelatedComment=Comment:Collaboration_Sandbox_1295603031029|CommentDatetime=2011-01-21T10:46:02+01:00|CommentContent=You can download this extension here: http://smwforum.ontoprise.com/smwforum/index.php/Download#SUITE_OF_HALO_EXTENSIONS|}} {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} {{Content hash|value=}} [[Rationale::A small sample comment for the Sandbox of the Collaboration extension in this Wiki.| ]] cc8a19a41ca12f284ae6865def786843 Property:Has comment editor 276 2011-07-04T13:23:58Z WikiSysop 1 {{Property}} __NOTOC__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::Contains the name of the last editor.]] {{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]] {{Content hash|value=}} {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} [[has domain and range::Category:Comment; WikiSysop 1 __NOTOC__ This widget allows you to embed a '''[http://developers.facebook.com/docs/reference/plugins/like-box/ Facebook Page Like Box]''' (iframe version) on your wiki page. Created by [http://www.mediawikiwidgets.org/User:Chris_White Chris White] == Using this widget == For information on how to use this widget, see [http://www.mediawikiwidgets.org/Facebook_Like_Box widget description page on MediaWikiWidgets.org]. ==Copy to your site== To use this widget on your site, just install [http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Widgets MediaWiki Widgets extension] and copy [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|action=edit}} full source code] of this page to your wiki as '''{{PAGENAME}}''' article. =Attributes= href - the URL to like. The XFBML version defaults to the current page. send - specifies whether to include a Send button with the Like button. This only works with the XFBML version. layout - there are three options. standard - displays social text to the right of the button and friends' profile photos below. Minimum width: 225 pixels. Default width: 450 pixels. Height: 35 pixels (without photos) or 80 pixels (with photos). button_count - displays the total number of likes to the right of the button. Minimum width: 90 pixels. Default width: 90 pixels. Height: 20 pixels. box_count - displays the total number of likes above the button. Minimum width: 55 pixels. Default width: 55 pixels. Height: 65 pixels. show_faces - specifies whether to display profile photos below the button (standard layout only) width - the width of the Like button. action - the verb to display on the button. Options: 'like', 'recommend' font - the font to display in the button. Options: 'arial', 'lucida grande', 'segoe ui', 'tahoma', 'trebuchet ms', 'verdana' colorscheme - the color scheme for the like button. Options: 'light', 'dark' ref - a label for tracking referrals; must be less than 50 characters and can contain alphanumeric characters and some punctuation (currently +/=-.:_). The ref attribute causes two parameters to be added to the referrer URL when a user clicks a link from a stream story about a Like action: fb_ref - the ref parameter fb_source - the stream type ('home', 'profile', 'search', 'other') in which the click occurred and the story type ('oneline' or 'multiline'), concatenated with an underscore. Widget:Facebook Like Box 444 489 2011-06-27T15:10:51Z WikiSysop 1 Created page with "__NOTOC__ This widget allows you to embed a '''[http://developers.facebook.com/docs/reference/plugins/like-box/ Facebook Page Like Box]''' (iframe version) on your wik..." __NOTOC__ This widget allows you to embed a '''[http://developers.facebook.com/docs/reference/plugins/like-box/ Facebook Page Like Box]''' (iframe version) on your wiki page. Created by [http://www.mediawikiwidgets.org/User:Chris_White Chris White] == Using this widget == For information on how to use this widget, see [http://www.mediawikiwidgets.org/Facebook_Like_Box widget description page on MediaWikiWidgets.org]. ==Copy to your site== To use this widget on your site, just install [http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Widgets MediaWiki Widgets extension] and copy [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|action=edit}} full source code] of this page to your wiki as '''{{PAGENAME}}''' article. ======= Collaboration Sandbox/Widget examples 2270 2011-08-30T08:29:17Z WikiSysop 1 This is a small example page that contains recommended widgets from the '''Widgets extension'''. There are a lot of other very interesting widgets that my be worthwhile for you. For example just have a look at the amazing [http://www.mediawikiwidgets.org/SlideShare SlideShare widget] or [http://www.mediawikiwidgets.org/Twitter Twitter widget] that can also be embedded in any page. An extensive list of available widgets can be found at [http://www.mediawikiwidgets.org/Widgets_Catalog the official Widgets Catalog]. We have taken our SMW+ Facebook page as an example to provide you with a simple use case. Feel free to modify these parser functions and use them in any wiki page you want to. 
{{#widget:Facebook Like Box
|profile=http://www.facebook.com/pages/SMW/192198727472226
|stream=false
|faces=false
|height=63
}}
creates this Facebook Like Box (see http://www.mediawikiwidgets.org/Facebook_Like_Box): {{#widget:Facebook Like Box |profile=http://www.facebook.com/pages/SMW/192198727472226 |stream=false |faces=false |height=63 }} A Google Calendar (more information is available at http://www.mediawikiwidgets.org/Google_Calendar) is embedded with this code: 
{{#widget:Google Calendar
|id=si8ocqn3duj6f8int3h57jm8qeunplut@import.calendar.google.com
|color=528800
|id=p2m2av9dhrh4n1ub7jlsc68s7o@group.calendar.google.com
|color=2952A3
|id=usa@holiday.calendar.google.com
|color=B1440E
|title=TechPresentations, NYCResistor, US Holidays
}}
and looks like this: {{#widget:Google Calendar |id=si8ocqn3duj6f8int3h57jm8qeunplut@import.calendar.google.com |color=528800 |id=p2m2av9dhrh4n1ub7jlsc68s7o@group.calendar.google.com |color=2952A3 |id=usa@holiday.calendar.google.com |color=B1440E |title=TechPresentations, NYCResistor, US Holidays }} {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} {{Content hash|value=}} 4e2a96aba49d8b31798baba9cb3f1258 Widget:Facebook Like Box 2282 2011-08-24T14:28:17Z WikiSysop 1 __NOTOC__ This widget allows you to embed a '''[http://developers.facebook.com/docs/reference/plugins/like-box/ Facebook Page Like Box]''' (iframe version) on your wiki page. Created by [http://www.mediawikiwidgets.org/User:Chris_White Chris White] == Using this widget == For information on how to use this widget, see [http://www.mediawikiwidgets.org/Facebook_Like_Box widget description page on MediaWikiWidgets.org]. ==Copy to your site== To use this widget on your site, just install [http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Widgets MediaWiki Widgets extension] and copy [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|action=edit}} full source code] of this page to your wiki as '''{{PAGENAME}}''' article. {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} {{Content hash|value=}} 6e1bae2ac462c90918d97425fc2e6d24 Widget:Google Calendar 2284 2011-08-24T15:01:58Z WikiSysop 1 This widget allows you to add '''[http://www.google.com/calendar/embedhelper Google Calendar]''' widget to your wiki page. It was originally created by [http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/User:Sergey_Chernyshev Sergey Chernyshev] for [http://www.techpresentations.org/Conferences#Current_.26_Upcoming_conferences upcoming conference calendar] on TechPresentations.org == Using this widget == For information on how to use this widget, see [http://www.mediawikiwidgets.org/Google_Calendar widget description page on MediaWikiWidgets.org]. == Copy to your site == To use this widget on your site, just install [http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Widgets MediaWiki Widgets extension] and copy [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|action=edit}} full source code] of this page to your wiki as '''{{FULLPAGENAME}}''' article. {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} {{Content hash|value=}} 1d29a776bd165351750bf836001ee0e5 Comment:Collaboration Sandbox 1295602691794 263 2011-04-14T12:45:02Z WikiSysop 1 {{Comment|CommentPerson=User:Collaboration|CommentRelatedArticle=Collaboration_Sandbox|CommentRating=1|CommentDatetime=2011-01-21T10:38:11+01:00|CommentContent=Do you want to let your visitors have a say and encourage discussions in your wiki? Then introduce meta talking with the Collaboration extension.|}} {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} {{Content hash|value=}} [[Rationale::A small sample comment for the Sandbox of the Collaboration extension in this Wiki.| ]] cb546e04b624a3cb2e1b07ed1067086e Comment:Collaboration Sandbox 1295602913516 264 2011-04-14T12:45:33Z WikiSysop 1 {{Comment|CommentPerson=User:Collaboration|CommentRelatedArticle=Collaboration_Sandbox|CommentRating=1|CommentDatetime=2011-01-21T10:41:52+01:00|CommentContent=Communicating about topics and media is a basic community feature. You can upgrade your wiki essentially if you allow your visitors to present and discuss their opinions about certain articles. Or you would like to set up a conversation focused wiki where commenting is the superordinate and actual objective and therefore always available. You can have it your way and expand the attraction of your wiki in any case. |}} {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} {{Content hash|value=}} [[Rationale::A small sample comment for the Sandbox of the Collaboration extension in this Wiki.| ]] 76c354a3478aa2d2bda1c500b02a69e6 Comment:Collaboration Sandbox 1295602948268 265 2011-04-14T12:06:43Z WikiSysop 1 {{Comment|CommentPerson=User:Collaboration|CommentRelatedArticle=Collaboration_Sandbox|CommentRelatedComment=Comment:Collaboration_Sandbox_1295602913516|CommentDatetime=2011-01-21T10:42:27+01:00|CommentContent=So let people take part and rate contents with the Collaboration extension.|}} {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} {{Content hash|value=}} [[Rationale::A small sample comment for the Sandbox of the Collaboration extension in this Wiki.| ]] 805daee6005bee77b252ca0ec0b3646f Comment:Collaboration Sandbox 1295603031029 266 2011-04-14T12:05:22Z WikiSysop 1 {{Comment|CommentPerson=User:Collaboration|CommentRelatedArticle=Collaboration_Sandbox|CommentDatetime=2011-01-21T10:43:50+01:00|CommentContent=The features of the Collaboration extension:
Let your visitors comment and rate articles and contents
Allow discussions about and replies to expressed opinions
Aggregate comments in different ways (e.g. lists of all exisiting comments, the 10 latest comments or all contributions of a certain user)|}} {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} {{Content hash|value=}} [[Rationale::A small sample comment for the Sandbox of the Collaboration extension in this Wiki.| ]] 363d82900dc5c2f336bb5b2ce8594251 Comment:Collaboration Sandbox 1295603163565 267 2011-04-14T12:05:14Z WikiSysop 1 {{Comment|CommentPerson=User:Collaboration|CommentRelatedArticle=Collaboration_Sandbox|CommentRelatedComment=Comment:Collaboration_Sandbox_1295603031029|CommentDatetime=2011-01-21T10:46:02+01:00|CommentContent=You can download this extension here: http://smwforum.ontoprise.com/smwforum/index.php/Download#SUITE_OF_HALO_EXTENSIONS|}} {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} {{Content hash|value=}} [[Rationale::A small sample comment for the Sandbox of the Collaboration extension in this Wiki.| ]] cc8a19a41ca12f284ae6865def786843 Template:Content hash 248 257 2010-12-21T14:25:49Z WikiSysop 1 [[Content hash::{{{value|}}}| ]] Template:Part of bundle 247 256 2010-12-21T14:25:58Z WikiSysop 1 [[Part of bundle::{{{value|}}}| ]] >>>>>>> .merge-right.r11977
